title: Google\Cloud\Run\V2\CloudSqlInstance
name: CloudSqlInstance
description:
Represents a specific Cloud SQL instance.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.run.v2.CloudSqlInstance

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.instances
params.description: The Cloud SQL instance connection names, as can be found in https://console.cloud.google.com/sql/instances. Visit https://cloud.google.com/sql/docs/mysql/connect-run for more information on how to connect Cloud SQL and Cloud Run. Format: {project}:{location}:{instance}
